QuestData.Title: Shatter the Sashj'tar
QuestData.Description: The Sashj'tar forces may have dwindled, but the Tidemistress has surrounded herself with her fiercest naga.$B$BThis is the time to strike a final crushing blow against the Sashj'tar.$B$BIf we can defeat them now, we may finally break the back of this menace and save Jandvik.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 12 Sashj'tar naga in the Sashj'tar Ruins.
QuestData.CompletionText: We must defeat the Sashj'tar once and for all.
QuestData.RewardText: We may have finally overcome this naga threat.
